articles.author: Betsy McKay
articles.title: Covid-19 Could Become Like the Flu if More People Get Vaccinated - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Virus eventually might behave like a routine illness but getting there will be difficult, as the spread of the Delta variant shows
articles.content: Covid-19 may become a routine illness like a common cold or the flu one day, virologists and epidemiologists say. But it will take a lot to get there, and the ferocious spread of the Delta variant th… [+8689 chars]
